A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I am completely dumbfounded having seen this movie. As an avid fan of the series\, this movie has let me down MORE than Phantom Menace. This wasn't a poorly directed movie\, it was something that should never have been allowed past the writer's room. Every plot point that had the audience waiting for this movie was responded to with a slap in the face. \"Nothing we made look important in the last movie has any importance in this one\". \"The Leia scene\" is absolutely trash and that alone should force this movie into the trash. \"The Snoke scene\" was a bigger let down than Darth Maul continuing the legacy of post Darth Vader arch enemies not really being that big a deal. Honestly\, I wanted to love this so much and basically left not sure I even care about Episode 9...
